string.value: Pio wants you to help collect recycled goods.

You ran into Pio, who is famous in Amherst for fixing broken goods. He asks you to break down scrap boxes from around town and bring back #t4031161#s and #t4031162#s. 

#t4031162# #c4031162# / #r5#k
#t4031161# #c4031161# / #r5#k
You broke the boxes and collected supplies for Pio. It was fun because you found other useful items in the boxes as well.
My goodness. I've been wandering around town, and I see so many recyclable items just being thrown away! Say, can you help me collect those?\n Don't worry, I'll reward you well for your effort.
That's right! Collect all the 'trash' around town.

I don't know if you've seen any abandoned wooden boxes on your way here, but your job is to break those boxes apart into #t4031162#s and #t4031161#s. Collect 5 of each for me, okay? 

#i4031161# #b5#k #t4031161#s
#i4031162# #b5#k #t4031162#s
Come on! Think about the planet!
What? You brought them all? Okay, let's see ...
See what I'm talking about? So many recyclable items, just carelessly tossed away. Hopefully there are more people like you in the world.
No, no, no! Press 'Q' to look at the Quest Info to check what you need to do!
